wikipedia_page.main: William Elliot Kyle, (13 July 1881, Hawick - 11 December 1959 ) was a Scottish rugby union player, who played as a forward.He was capped twenty one times for Scotland between 1902-1910. He also played for Hawick RFC. (23)

link_mentions.page: Rugby union in the Scottish Borders
